tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: Let's make the first connection. Go find your Time Machine and drag it back here.

paragraphs.text: The first connection is between a Trading Session and the Time Machine we have been working on.  This reference tells our chart which Trading System and Session to listen for.
Once you are back create a reference between your Time Machine and the Backtesting Session.
These steps are the same for connecting to a Live Trading Session. The only difference is the Session will be found under the Production Trading Task hierarchy instead.
